name: Bazinga
description:
In this game you will dash through levels littered with traps, and use different power-ups to aid you on your journey. This game was made for Mini Jam 74, the theme for this game jam was Chaos and we were also only able to use a certain set of keys on top of that. This game is very simple, and not very long if you know what you are doing. It's kinda in a similar vein as geometry dash.

Story:

Things have not been great for you recently and you do not know why. Completing all the levels you find that it is Sheldon Cooper himself, from the hit TV show the Big Bang Theory that is ruining your life. Kill that bastard now!
